Name: Flower Walk
Description: Go on a walk and identify 1 new flower

Name: Fix It!
Description: Fix one thing in your home.

Name: Learn Something New
Description: Take 20 minutes to learn something new

Name: Go Outside!!!
Description: Just go outside and get 10 minutes of fresh air

Name: Reclaim Old Hobby
Description: Look around your home and pick up one of your old hobbies for a half hour

Name: Video Games
Description: Simply play a video game. Maybe that one you rage quite a year ago.

Name: Discover a New Meal
Description: Find a new recipe that you want to try cooking this week. Add the ingredients to your shopping list.

Name: Read Something You Find Fun
Description: Read for 20 minutes. Not that boring book you were forced to read in HS. Read something you find fun!
